name: Biggest Little Golf Tournament
description:
Biggest Little Mini Golf Tournament is an RPG mini golf game where you take your chipping skill to the mini golf course in a battle against Hey Reb! the UNLV rebel. Along with Wolfie Jr from UNR go through the game as a pack where you battle to win back the Freemont Cannon!

Minigolf

While battling to win the Freemont Cannon, explore the wild deserts inspired by the high deserts of Nevada and the green forests of Tahoe. With a unique approach to mini golf the long form levels allow for you to be extremely calculated at each hit of the ball. That being said, don't go out of bounds or you might lose a stroke! Despite all that Hey Reb! does to make you lose don’t fret as Wolfie Jr always has special powers he can provide to the pack.

Dialogue

During your journey you will find banter like no other that highlights the deep rooted rivalry between UNR and UNLV.

With wicked animations this is where you will find out the backstory to why UNR lost the cannon and why they need you to get it back!
